price: 38.tama digaala kah massosnem sinni maalu Sinam yoobulah yaceeh Yalla Nummayse waah elle caboh Ayró Nummayse waa mara kinni, Sheytan kataysa как yekke Num, toysa kataysa как manxu uma Numuuy.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ رِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِۗ وَمَن يَكُنِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لَهُۥ قَرِينٗا فَسَآءَ قَرِينٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yunfiqūna amwālahum riāa al-nāsi walā yu'minūna bil-lahi walā bil-yawmi al-ākhiri waman yakuni al-shayṭānu lahu qarīnan fasāa qarīnan
